challenges.title: Advanced HTML and CSS Projects with Designs
description: These projects will have you build a webpage based on a design.
You will be provided with the assets like text, fonts and images.

Your webpage should complete the design with the same look and feel as much as possible

It does not have to be exact.

challenges.title: ** Reviewing Professional Source Code
description: Reading professional source code is a great way to learn.
You will be provided with professional source code after you complete each of these projects.
Take time to compare your source code to the professional version to learn what strategies and techniques were used.
Commit to not look at the professional source code until you have completed and submitted your project.

challenges.title: Interphase Webpage
description: Build this designed webpage.
The page must match the design as close as possible.
Technology Stack: 1. Use only HTML and CSS.
Responsive Sizing: 2. No responsive sizing, use min-width: 1200px;
Click here to view the full size image.
Click here to watch a video of the interactive features of the project.
Click here for the assets needed to build this project.
Link directly to the font-awesome css here
The font used for this project is lato, link directly to the css here
Remember to use the Research-Ask method if you get stuck.

challenges.title: Interphase Webpage Review
description: Confirm that you have that you have completed and submitted the Interphase Webpage project.

Please review the professional source code and compare it to your own.

Click here to view the professional source code.
Confirm that you have reviewed the professional source code.
